# Generated Files

This directory contains files generated by the GitHub Actions build pipeline.

**Do not commit generated files manually.** They are:
- Built automatically when `sources/` changes
- Published as GitHub Releases
- Available for download at: https://github.com/waycore/waycore-rag-knowledge/releases

## Files

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `knowledge.db` | SQLite database with FTS5 full-text search |
| `vectors.idx` | Hnswlib vector index for semantic search |
| `manifest.json` | Build metadata and statistics |

## Local Development

To build locally:

```bash
pip install -r scripts/requirements.txt
python scripts/build_index.py
```
